sentences.en: All company employees, the implementation of a remarkable, cohesive and enterprising spirit.
sentences.cn: 公司所有员工, 有着非凡的执行力 、 凝聚力和进取精神.

sentences.en: an enterprising scheme to provide interest-free loans
sentences.cn: 一项提供无息贷款的创业计划

sentences.en: Debra is a very enterprising young black business-woman who is involved in a lot of activities.
sentences.cn: 德布拉是个年青而又非常有胆识的黑人女商人，其涉猎广泛。

sentences.en: It's very enterprising of them to start up a business like that.
sentences.cn: 他们那样去开创生意是很有魄力的.

sentences.en: Let those go farther, who are wiser or more enterprising.
sentences.cn: 让那些比我聪明、比我更大胆的人继续向前吧.

sentences.en: Man is usually a wandering and enterprising animal.
sentences.cn: 人通常是一种游动的和有进取心的动物.

sentences.en: Modern farms are enterprising businesses which keep only the livestock that can pay its way.
sentences.cn: 现在的农场是富于创业精神的企业单位,它只饲养能出售以赢利的家畜.

sentences.en: More enterprising dancers, singly or in couples , frequently broke into brief improvisations.
sentences.cn: 更富于想象力的舞蹈者常突然独自或成对作短暂的即兴舞.
菲尔是个有进取心的厨师.

sentences.en: She may not have been the cleverest candidate but she was certainly the most enterprising.
sentences.cn: 她就算不是最聪明的候选人,也肯定是最有事业心的.

sentences.en: Some enterprising members found ways of reducing their expenses or raising their incomes.
sentences.cn: 一些有创新精神的成员找到各种增收减支的方法。

sentences.en: Some enterprising students are designing software.
sentences.cn: 一些有创业精神的学生在设计软件。

sentences.en: The enterprising students brought in carpet weavers, who reassembled the papers, strip by painstaking strip.
sentences.cn: 不肯善罢甘休的学生们找来了地毯编织工.这些工人把一条条碎纸拼到了一起.

sentences.en: They are not naturally daring and enterprising but home - loving and affectionate.
sentences.cn: 胆大,冒险并不是他们的天性,他们的天性是爱家室、重感情的.

sentences.en: With macro and strategic foresight, professional, responsibility, exploration innovation and enterprising spirit.
sentences.cn: 具有宏观和战略眼光, 强烈的专业心, 责任感, 开拓创新意识和积极进取精神.

sentences.en: With their enterprising spirit , women athletes have done brilliantly in the global sports arena.
sentences.cn: 女运动员在国际运动场上锐意进取,成绩辉煌.

sentences.en: You are no longer the enterprising cook that once you were.
sentences.cn: 你已不再是当年那个敢于创新的厨师了.

words.tran_cn: 企业；事业；进取心；事业心

phrases.tran_cn: 进取心，进取精神；创业精神

trans.tran_cn: 有事业心的，有进取心的，有创业精神的
trans.tran_en: having the ability to think of new activities or ideas and make them work
